speaker: Charlie McCreevy,
english: Charlie McCreevy, Member of the Commission . − Mr President, I would just like to thank Mr Hammerstein for his report, and also the committee chairman, Mr Libicki, and the vice-chairs, for all the work they have done in collaboration with us over the years. I trust that the spirit of collaboration will continue up to the end of this legislature.
original: Charlie McCreevy, Member of the Commission . − Mr President, I would just like to thank Mr Hammerstein for his report, and also the committee chairman, Mr Libicki, and the vice-chairs, for all the work they have done in collaboration with us over the years. I trust that the spirit of collaboration will continue up to the end of this legislature.
